name: Master Yura
text: Greetings, Rena. I am Master Yura.

name: Master Yura
text: I am here to impart the art of swordsmanship upon you.

name: Master Yura
text: Press 'A' or 'D' to move, 'F' to attack, 'Space' to jump and 'Esc' to pause.

name: Master Yura
text: To progress through a level, you must collect 10 coins or more.

name: Master Yura
text: May I inquire as to why you seek my guidance?

name: you
text: I aspire to rescue my village from the clutches of the nameless witch that assailed it three years ago.
